text:
@Mike_Pence Be a hero not a zero!  Stop lying and lead the task force in earnest!  Trump is most likely going to blame coronavirus chaotic fiasco on you and drop you from ticket.  Ask yourself can you live knowing how many people have died because of lack of leadership? 
BE a HERO NOT A ZERO
